title: Science: Sense Organs
description: Learn about the five sense organs and how they help us understand the world around us through clear explanations for Class 3 students.

subtopics.title: My Sense Organs
subtopics.content:
## Understanding Our Senses

We come to know the world around us when we touch, smell, see, hear, and taste things. The parts of our body that help us sense the world are called sense organs. There are 5 sense organs that work together to help us experience our surroundings.

### The Five Sense Organs:
- **Eyes**: Help us to see things around us
- **Ears**: Help us to hear sounds
- **Tongue**: Helps us to taste food
- **Nose**: Helps us to smell things
- **Skin**: Helps us to feel touch
subtopics.codeExample:
### Sense Organ Questions:
- Which organ helps us see?
- What do we use to hear sounds?
- Which part helps us taste food?
- What do we use to smell things?
- Which organ helps us feel?

### Practice Activity:
- Name the sense organ for each action
- Match sense organs with their functions
- Identify what each sense helps us do
